suncertify.business
Interface BookingBusinessAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingBusinessAdapterImp
public interface BookingBusinessAdapter

This is a business logic interface that contains the various transaction scripts determined by the identified use cases e.g. book contractor.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

Method Summary
 void bookContractor(long recNo, java.lang.String custNo)
          Books a particular Contractor using the combined name and location field as the primary key to locate the record, and an eight digit customer number to update the owner field.
 boolean isContractorBooked(long recNo)
          Checks to see if a particular contractor record has already been booked.
 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,Contractor> searchContractors(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String location)
          Populates an HashMap of Long record numbers (file positions) and Contractors records when search criteria is entered and returns it.
 

Method Detail

searchContractors

java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,Contractor> searchContractors(java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.String location)
                                                           throws RecordNotFoundException
Populates an HashMap of Long record numbers (file positions) and Contractors records when search criteria is entered and returns it.

Parameters:
name - the name search criteria.
location - the location search criteria.
Returns:
a HashMap of records numbers and Contractor objects.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
SecurityException - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.

bookContractor

void bookContractor(long recNo,
                    java.lang.String custNo)
                    throws RecordNotFoundException,
                           SecurityException,
                           RecordAlreadyBookedException
Books a particular Contractor using the combined name and location field as the primary key to locate the record, and an eight digit customer number to update the owner field.

Parameters:
recNo - the record number (file position).
custNo - the eight digit customer id.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
SecurityException - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
RecordAlreadyBookedException - if the record already has a customer number

isContractorBooked

boolean isContractorBooked(long recNo)
                           throws RecordNotFoundException
Checks to see if a particular contractor record has already been booked. i.e. has a record has an eight digit customer number in the owner field.

Parameters:
recNo - the record number (file position) to be checked.
Returns:
true is it is booked or false if not.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
